get(Locale) - Method in class org.daisy.pipeline.braille.libhyphen.impl.LibhyphenTableRegistry
Try to find a table based on the given locale.
get(Locale) - Method in class org.daisy.pipeline.braille.libhyphen.LibhyphenTablePath
Lookup a table based on a locale, using the fact that table names are always in the form `hyph_language[_COUNTRY[_variant]].dic`
